Empowering Minds, Shaping the Future: Collaborative Research for Women in ML.

Welcome to the T端bingen Women in Machine Learning (TWiML), where we champion diversity, empowerment, and innovation in AI. Through inclusive programs and supportive environments, we enhance the experience of women, driving professional success and amplifying their voices globally.

  • Empowering Women: Elevating the experience and representation of women in machine learning through inclusive programs and supportive environments.
  • Driving Diversity: Increasing the impact of women in machine learning by fostering professional success and amplifying their voices in the community.
  • Building Confidence: Providing opportunities for women to enhance their technical skills and visibility, empowering them to thrive in AI and robotics.
  • Championing Change: Leading the charge towards a gender-inclusive future in AI and robotics, guided by our commitment to equality and ethical innovation.

Embrace the journey with TWiML as we forge a path toward gender-inclusive progress in AI. Together, we break barriers, ignite innovation, and sculpt a future of equality. Your presence enriches our collective pursuit of excellence in machine learning.

About WiML T端bingen

WiML T端bingen is a group of women pushing the boundries of societal stereotypes and working to advance the inclusion of women in AI.

We are fueled by a passion to cause positive impact in the society through machine learning.

We specialize in natural language processing, and computer vision, aiming to solve complex problems and drive progress.

Education and community engagement are central to our mission, as we strive to empower the next generation of AI experts through workshops and mentorship.
